uk.ac.ebi.gxa.db.utils
Class AtlasDB

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.gxa.db.utils.AtlasDB

public class AtlasDB
extends Object

Utils for writing atlas loader API objects (see also uk.ac.ebi.microarray.atlas.model) to a database. Should be supplied a connection

Author:
Andrey Zorin

experimentExists

public static boolean experimentExists(Connection connection,
                                       String accession)
                                throws SQLException
A convenience method for querying for the presence of an experiment in the atlas database. This method returns true if the experiment already exists in the database, and false if it could not be found. You should not reload an experiment that already exists without first deleting the old one.

Parameters:
connection - the connection to the atlas database
accession - the accession number of the experiment to query for
Returns:
true if thie experiment already exists in the database, false otherwise
Throws:
SQLException - if there was a problem communicating with the database
